body.p: Come and celebrate your freedom in Ljubljana! During FSFE's annual strategy retreat in Slovenia's capital, Free Software fans will party with the members of FSFE's General Assembly and our executive at Cyberpipe [OpenStreetMap]. Starting at 21:00, we will enjoy a lively exchange of ideas over drinks and beats.
Please drop us a line to president-assist@fsfeurope.org to let us know you're coming. See you there!
